level.text: An applicant for a license, registration, or certification who is not domiciled in the metropolitan Washington, DC area shall do the following:
Request a fingerprint package from the Health Professional Licensing Administration;
Take the fingerprint card to the local or state police agency and be fingerprinted; and
Mail the completed fingerprint card in the supplied envelope to the Health Professional Licensing Administration.
Source: Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 6025, 6027 (July 31, 2009).
